summary: This is a brief email correspondence from July 9, 2019, indicating that CSOs (likely Court Security Officers or similar) received a telephone call from a female who identified herself and claimed to have information about Jeffrey Epstein. The document provides a return number but the caller's name is redacted.

events.title: Phone call reporting information on Epstein
events.description: CSOs received a telephone call from an unidentified female who stated she had information about Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: On July 9, 2019, CSOs received a phone call from a female claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The caller's name is redacted in the document, indicated by the placeholder 'ho'.
The correspondence includes a return phone number for the caller (also redacted in the provided text).
The email is marked with 'Importance: Normal' and was sent at 00:38 UTC on the date in question.
